text: Patrick O'Donoghue (4 May 1934 â€“ 24 January 2021) was an Irish Roman Catholic bishop. He was the fifth Bishop of Lancaster, who led the diocese from 2001 to 2009. He was born in Mourne Abbey, County Cork, Ireland. O'Donoghue died on 24 January 2021 in Mallow, County Cork at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Irish Roman Catholic bishops
title: Patrick O'Donoghue (bishop)
